title: create_bank_account API Request (ZOHOBOOKS)
description: Schema for create_bank_account - extracted from zohobooks OpenAPI spec

account_number.description: Number associated with the Bank Account

currency_id.description: ID of the Currency associated with the Account

currency_code.description: Code of the currency associated with the Bank Account

is_primary_account.description: Check if the Account is Primary Account in Zoho Books
